title.narrative: Access To Justice for 10,000 Vulnerable Persons

description.narrative: Burundi, an African country that ranks among the poorest on earth, has gone through a brutal civil war. Unrest continues, and it is in the midst of a serious human rights crisis. Burundians are mostly illiterate and don't have the tools to fight against the violence and injustices done to them. They don't know how to use the law to protect themselves. But a group of Burundian young people seeks to change that. They have formed an association to promote awareness and human rights interventions.
